sentences.en: A measured, muffled snore issued from Aunt Polly's chamber.
sentences.cn: 从波莉姨妈卧室里传来一阵匀称的 、 沉闷的鼾声.

sentences.en: As the night deepened, Huck began to nod, and presently to snore.
sentences.cn: 夜色渐深, 哈克打起盹来, 不久便鼾声大作.

sentences.en: Do you know of any way to stop a person snore?
sentences.cn: 你知道有什麽方法可以制止打呼噜 吗 ?

sentences.en: He could hear the old man snoring.
He curled down in the weeds and soon began to snore.
sentences.cn: 他弯起身子在乱草中躺下,一会儿就打起鼾来.

sentences.en: He soon fell asleep and began to snore.
sentences.cn: 他很快睡着并开始打起鼾来.

sentences.en: His head fell forward and he began to snore.
sentences.cn: 他头向前一栽,就打起呼噜来.

sentences.en: His loud snore kept me awake.
sentences.cn: 他的鼾声大得使我睡不着.

sentences.en: His medical interests include snore disease surgical procedures and throat microsurgery.
sentences.cn: 从事医学临床工作30多年,擅长五官科各种常见病及疑难杂症的诊断、疗及手术;尤其精于鼾症手术治疗、撑喉镜下的喉显微手术.
他的鼾声打扰了我们的睡眠.

sentences.en: How shall we snore out the money that we have earned?
sentences.cn: 我们怎样分配赚来的钱.

sentences.en: I never saw someone with one eye open snore so much.
sentences.cn: 我从没见过有人睁着眼睛睡觉、还打鼾呢.

sentences.en: If you sleep on your back with your mouth open you are likely to snore.
sentences.cn: 如果你脸朝上张着嘴睡觉,你就很可能打鼾.

sentences.en: It was really snore. Ah Q whispered Wang Hu's ear.
sentences.cn: 的的确确是鼾声, 阿Q对着王胡耳语一番.

sentences.en: John rarely snores, but last night he really started snore.
sentences.cn: 约翰很少打呼噜的, 但是昨天晚上他的呼噜就像是拉锯.

sentences.en: Laugh and the world laughs with you ; snore and you sleep alone.
sentences.cn: 笑,别人和你一起笑; 打呼噜,你独自睡觉.

sentences.en: Uncle Arthur, after a loud snore, woke suddenly.
sentences.cn: 阿瑟大叔响亮地打了个鼾后，突然醒了过来。

words.tran_cn: 鼻息粗的人，发鼾声的人；表示轻蔑的人；怒号的大风；不寻常的人或物

trans.tran_en: to breathe in a noisy way through your mouth and nose while you are asleep
